display_long_description:
Hunt is the only VR game that can drive and hunt at same time! Hunt 2.0 added Volcanic Island to double the play content and grabbable gun and bow support. Hunt 3.0 allows user to start playing any of the first 12 levels.

After dinosaurs were revived, they occupied a remote island and enslaved many other animals. In order to control the dinosaurs, human beings need to research their eggs. You will go to the dinosaur island and collect these eggs. You will face attacks from terrifying dinosaurs and colony animals. This game has twenty-four thrilling levels.
 
Key Features: 

- Use Meta Quest Touch controllers to control the racer and four different cars through the river and island.

-  Fight with all kinds of ferocious dinosaurs (including about twenty different dinosaurs such as T-Rex, Brachiosaurus, Velociraptor) and colony animals face to face in a full-featured vehicle.

- Use eco-friendly air cannon to defend yourself and powerful air swirl device to collect eggs.

- Use Bow and Gun to defend yourself. Holding Bow or Gun will switch to first person perspective and give you vivid shooting angle, releasing Bow or Gun will switch back to third person perspective and give you smooth viewing angle. 

- Drive through bumpy hills and jungles hunting for dinosaur eggs. Dinosaur attacks may occur at any time.

- Optimized smooth viewing angles to help you avoid the dizziness of traditional VR car games.

- The X button on the left-hand controller can give you menu help at any time.
